xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: export.pdf.options.template=Template export.pdf.options.template.hint=Le template PDF contrôle les informations affichées sur la page de garde, dans la table des matières ainsi que dans l'entête et le bas de page de chaque page. ### Missing: export.pdf.options.loadFailure=Failed to load the PDF export options. ### Missing: export.pdf.hint=Export as Portable Document Format (PDF) using the Web Browser ### Missing: export.pdf.modal.close=Close ### Missing: export.pdf.inProgress=Exporting as PDF... ### Missing: export.pdf.failed=Failed to export as PDF ### Missing: export.pdf.lastError=The PDF export log contains errors: {0} ### Missing: export.pdf.canceling=Canceling PDF export... ### Missing: export.pdf.canceled=PDF export canceled ### Missing: export.pdf.cancelFailed=Failed to cancel the PDF export ### Missing: export.pdf.loading=Loading... ### Missing: export.pdf.pageReadyTimeout=Timeout waiting for web page to be ready for print. ### Missing: export.pdf.templates.default=Default template ### Missing: export.pdf.templates.default.versionInfo=Version {0} authored by {1} on {2} ### Missing: export.pdf.template.name=PDF Template ### Missing: export.pdf.template.hint=Template used by PDF export ### Missing: export.pdf.template.provider=PDF Template Provider ### Missing: export.pdf.template.skinExtensionInfo=The CSS and JavaScript skin extensions provided by this page are also part of the PDF template and thus are loaded automatically when the PDF template is used. ### Missing: admin.export.pdf=PDF Export ### Missing: admin.export.pdf.description=Configure how wiki pages are exported to PDF. ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.status=Status ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.configuration=Configuration ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.saveComment=Updated the PDF export configuration from the Administration ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.reset=Reset ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.reset.hint=Restore the default configuration ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.reset.confirmation=Are you sure you want to restore the default configuration? All your changes will be lost. ### Missing: export.pdf.config.default=(default) ### Missing: export.pdf.config.empty=(empty) ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.label=Generator ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.hint=The tool used to generate the PDF. ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.checking=Checking if the PDF generator is available... ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.checkFailed=Failed to check if the PDF generator is available. ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.available=Available ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.unavailable=The PDF generator is currently unavailable. ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.userBrowser.label=User Browser ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.userBrowser.hint=The PDF is generated client-side using the print function provided by the user's own web browser. ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.chromeDockerContainer.label=Chrome Docker Container ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.chromeDockerContainer.hint=The PDF is generated server-side using a headless Chrome web browser running inside a Docker container on the same server as XWiki. ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.remoteChrome.label=Remote Chrome ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.remoteChrome.hint=The PDF is generated server-side using a remote Chrome web browser that may run on a different server than XWiki. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_cover=Cover ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_cover.hint=The information displayed on the first page. E.g. the title and the author ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_toc=Table of Contents ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_toc.hint=Usually lists the content headings along with their page numbers. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_header=Header ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_header.hint=The information displayed at the top of each page, except for the cover page. E.g. the title ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_footer=Footer ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_footer.hint=The information displayed at the bottom of each page, except for the cover page. E.g. the number of the page ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_templates=Templates ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_templates.hint=The list of PDF templates the user can select from when exporting wiki pages to PDF. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_serverSide=Server Side ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_serverSide.hint=Whether the PDF export should be performed server-side, e.g. using a headless Chrome web browser running inside a Docker container, or client-side, using the user's web browser instead. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeHost=Chrome Host ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeHost.hint=The host running the headless Chrome web browser, specified either by its name or by its IP address. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeRemoteDebuggingPort=Chrome Remote Debugging Port ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeRemoteDebuggingPort.hint=The port number used for communicating with the headless Chrome web browser. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_xwikiHost=XWiki Host ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_xwikiHost.hint=The host name or IP address that the headless Chrome browser should use to access the XWiki instance (i.e. the print preview page). ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeDockerImage=Chrome Docker Image ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeDockerImage.hint=The Docker image used to create the Docker container running the headless Chrome web browser. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeDockerContainerName=Chrome Docker Container Name ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeDockerContainerName.hint=The name of the Docker container running the headless Chrome web browser. This is especially useful when reusing an existing container. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_dockerNetwork=Docker Network ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_dockerNetwork.hint=The name or id of the Docker network to add the Chrome Docker container to. This is useful when XWiki itself runs inside a Docker container and you want to have the Chrome container in the same network in order for them to communicate. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_pageReadyTimeout=Page Ready Timeout ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_pageReadyTimeout.hint=The number of seconds to wait for the web page to be ready for print before timing out. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_maxContentSize=Maximum Content Size ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_maxContentSize.hint=The maximum content size, in kilobytes (KB), that can be included in a single PDF export. Use 0 to disable the limit. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_replaceFOP=Replace FOP ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_replaceFOP.hint=Replace the old PDF export based on Apache Formatting Objects Processor (FOP).
